actions.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires the FAA to preserve original aircraft engineering data in the agency's possession and to require such data to be made available to the public, for non-commercial purposes, upon a Freedom of Information Act request.
purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 112-46 to prohibit the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) from destroying vintage aircraft type certificate data and to require such data to be made available to the public, for non-commercial purposes, upon a Freedom of Information Act request.
